Module ulb.infof307.g10.app.controllers
Package ulb.infof307.g10.network.database

Class DatabaseSQLManager

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g10.network.database.DatabaseSQLManager
public class DatabaseSQLManager extends Object
The class DatabaseSQLManager is used to manage SQL requests.
